N[Integrate[59/t*Exp[-(2.699102564 + 2.887435897)*t]*(2.887435897/2.699102564)^(59/2)*BesselI[59, 2*t*Sqrt[2.887435897*2.699102564]] - 
   59/t*Exp[-(2.699102564 + 2.887435897)*t]*(2.887435897/2.699102564)^(59/2) BesselI[59, 2*t*Sqrt[2.887435897*2.699102564]]*587/x*
    Exp[-(2.682564 + 3.104103)*x]*(3.104103/2.682564)^(587/2)*BesselI[587, 2*x*Sqrt[3.104103*2.682564]], {x, 0, t}, {t, 0, 700}]]
